text: "Secret Journey" is a 1982 song by The Police and is the fourth single taken from their fourth studio album Ghost in the Machine. It was not released as a single in the United Kingdom but it was released in the United States and Canada. ==Track listing== ===7": A&M; / AM 2408-S (US)=== # "Secret Journey" – 3:34 # "Darkness" – 3:14 Category:1982 songs Category:The Police songs
title: Secret Journey (song)
